SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.annotation
Annotation Type Bean

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Bean

Specialization of the Component annotation indicating that the annotated Class is a dependency-injection bean, meaning it is a candidate for auto-detection by the framework if classpath scanning is enabled.

Beans that are picked up during auto-detection are registered with the InfinitumContext and stored in its BeanFactory. If a bean name is not suggested, the bean will be registered using the camelcase version of its Class name. For example, an annotated Class FooBar will use the bean name fooBar unless otherwise specified.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0 07/11/12
Author:
Tyler Treat

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.String value
          Declares the Bean name to be used.
 

value

public abstract java.lang.String value
Declares the Bean name to be used.

Returns:
the suggested Bean name
Default:
""
